english.segment1: Oh my God, I can't believe. In the way we strive, this urgency.
english.segment2: When I see we can make it, we'll make it. We can make it, we'll make it.
english.segment3: [Chorus]. Are we wastin' too much time. Are we wastin' too much time.
english.segment4: Never stop, for fear of silence. Can't connect, we're all willing victims
english.segment5: When I see we can make it, we'll make it. We can make it, we'll make it.
